description:
Course Description

If you are a teacher and the classroom is your office, this is the course for you. It doesn't matter whether you are a beginning teacher or have years of experience, Managing Student Behaviour will make or break your day.

This is the first course in the Managing Student Behaviour suite of courses.

The course is The Essentials.

Learn the skills that make student behaviour work in your favour.

This course includes

  • 40 minutes of Videos
  • 7 Lectures

Managing Student Behaviour separates good teachers from GREAT teachers. Great teachers make student behaviour look easy. Learn what makes them different.

At the end of this course you will

  • understand the classroom dynamics that impact on student behaviour;
  • recognise teaching strategies that make a difference to student behaviour;
  • become a better teacher.
title: Managing Student Behaviour - The Essentials
